title: how is rageblade and trinity  on jax

replies.body: Trinity is godlike on him, but Rageblade is more expensive than something like Gunblade or BOTRK. I'd recommend one of the other 2 instead of rageblade.
Which is why I said you can build Gunblade OR BOTRK second, Gunblade lets you burst squishes easier while BOTRK allows for more DPS and better kiting/Dueling vs tanky targets.
doesn't bork get counter by armor

> [{quoted}](name=I Win Haha,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0JerWXJ7,comment-id=0002000000000001,timestamp=2016-09-01T22:17:27.233+0000)
>
> doesn't bork get counter by armor

how ? deals 6% of the targets current health as physical damage giving you more damage based on targets hp.  so if a target has 2400 hp and you have bork you will do 144 more physical damage on autos + the 25 base damage  giving you 169 physical damage per auto with out runes, other items, masteries. and lets say your target that has 2400 hp has 75 armor 169-75 = 94 damage taken. but the reason why you get bork isnt just for the ad its for the attack speed, life steal and the active.

> [{quoted}](name=DeltaRaven,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0JerWXJ7,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2016-09-01T22:11:00.437+0000)
>
> Which is why I said you can build Gunblade OR BOTRK second, Gunblade lets you burst squishes easier while BOTRK allows for more DPS and better kiting/Dueling vs tanky targets.

you stated and i quote " Trinity is godlike on him, but Rageblade is more expensive than something like Gunblade or BOTRK. I'd recommend one of the other 2 instead of rageblade." therefore saying cuz of the 200 gold difference you recommend {{item:3153}} {{item:3146}} over {{item:3124}} due to cost

It's mostly preference, cost is just another reason, these 2 items also give you life steal and helps with Jax's lack of sustain. After Rageblade got changed the New trinity Force basically took it's place in Jax's build path. Typically he builds 2 offensive items and then goes for defense, so you go for a Damage item (Trinity or Rageblade) and then another one that gives you life steal (BOTRK or Gunblade). After that you get defense so you can't easily be 100-0'd by a burst mage or assassin, and the active on Gunblade or BOTRK makes you harder to Kite for ADC's. The fact that the items are cheaper than rageblade is just an Added bonus.

>
> Trinity is godlike on him, but Rageblade is more expensive than something like Gunblade or BOTRK. I'd recommend one of the other 2 instead of rageblade.

there is a difference of 200 gold between {{item:3153}} {{item:3146}} and {{item:3124}} to say its more expensive and not worth considering isnt really true 200 gold is what 15 creeps or one kill?
rageblade is garbage on anyone that's not kogmaw
You would need at least some sort of on hit to make decent use of rageblade.
Decent but expensive as hell. Trinity and gunblade gives him more for less gold

3600 for {{item:3124}} 3400 for {{item:3146}} so 200 difference isnt alot on a champ that is item dependent to being with
Thank you. I forgot what the prices were. I thought gunblade was a lot less. I still stand that gunblade gives you a lot more in terms of value. Also the healing is really nice
That is basically his core build?
